page.title: 16ONGAR FIRE STATION
page.content: Ongar Fire Station is situated in the middle of Ongar and is equipped to deal with any fire in the local area.There are{2 engines}based at the station. One of which is always ready. The station is manned by{29 {officers.}These men are split up into {four shifts,}Red,Green,Blue and White. On average the station answers{2 {calls a day.}Equipment is good but they are always on the lookout for better machinery. As it is Ongar Fire Station is well equipped to fight big fires in and around Ongar . Not that it is generally needed, because in their opinion fire precautions in the local area are very good with the exception of two buildings ,one of which is a tent makers and the other is Ongar War Memorial Hospital. These cause them concern due to their age and usage.
